job_description:
• Have deep experience designing and building scalable software systems.
• Empathize with the frustrations and processes that slow engineering teams down, informed by hands-on experience.
• (Nice to have) Have a voracious and intrinsic desire to learn new skills and share knowledge clearly and concisely.
• (Nice to have) Are comfortable with ambiguity and rapidly changing conditions, seeing change as an opportunity to add structure and order when needed.
• (Nice to have) Have experience maintaining a quality bar and engineering velocity for products shipped at large scale.
• Cross-team enablement: Work directly with hardware and software teams to map pain points, capture requirements, and build tools that solve real-world bottlenecks.
• Existing ecosystem integration: Collaborate with the broader Engineering Acceleration team to adopt and evolve their internal systems for the unique needs of consumer hardware and software.
• Are proficient in Python, C, C++, or Rust, with solid Linux fundamentals (build systems, networking, process management).
